website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice if you're looking to give strength back to nails that have been thinned and damaged by acrylics.
pros: This formula works wonderfully to repair damage caused by acrylic nails
We appreciated how quickly the product dried
We noticed an almost instant difference in nail strength
After a few applications, thin nails stop peeling at the ends
cons: While the formula builds easily, it is difficult to remove all of the layers of polish when you're ready to take it off

customer_reviews.title: Love my nails
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 4 months now and I absolutely love my nails. Before using this I had weak nails that were prone to peeling and breaking after using gel polish for a while. The nails were frequently down to the quick and I thought eventually they would get their regular strength back but it didn't happen after repeated growth. I decided to give this a shot after reading reviews. They still have some healing to do, but the pictures don't lie.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and now can only find it at amazon. It is, hands down, the best product to use on your nails to strengthen and help your nails grow. Best product ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casimon

customer_reviews.title: Would like to know which products can’t be sent back before ordering!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize it had formaldehyde in it! Having had a nail bed problem in the past that required a biopsy, I was unable to use the product, due to the formaldehyde content. Amazon site informed me product could not be sent back due to gasses, etc. in product. Didn’t understand explanation as product had been mailed to me. Usually very happy with my orders from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this product as instructed for amazing results!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how this product nourished and strengthened my nails which has previously had been as thin and weak as tissue paper. After about 4 months of faithful use, I was getting compliments on my beautiful nails...and they became much stronger too!!! I highly recommend this product to my friends and family and even strangers who notice!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After using Prolana Nail Fortifier my nails are worse. The product caused the nails to peel, split and then break.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneane Young

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product made my cuticles dry which then led to hangnails! It says they guarantee results, but Amazon won't allow return of flammable products. Wish I knew that beforehand, as I would not have purchased product.
customer_reviews.author: R.O.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I have spent lots of money on products that don't work for my weak, brittle nails and nothing has worked until now. I LOVE this product. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: New nails
customer_reviews.text: Great on my nails after 2 months of quarantine. I’ve been having my nails done for 35 years. First time without anything but this!
customer_reviews.author: Geri A.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I have been using it for about 8 years now. I have not used acrylic ever since my nails are long and strong. I have tried other nail strengthening brands and they haven’t worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Candaisy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This product for me does not dry my nails. That helps polish stay on a bit longer. My nail tech uses this exclusively in her shop.
customer_reviews.author: Rags44

customer_reviews.title: I would of given it a Negative Rating if I Could!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not Like the product.. My nails cracked and Pealed even weeks after applying. Says to remove with nail polish remover every 5 to 7 Days You can’t even get it off your nail!! My mom also bought a bottle after 2 wks of Use she said the same thing to me her nails seem to be worse off with the product on.. Don’t buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This nail treatment has really fortified my nails and they are finally growing to a healthy state. I am shocked to see that the peeling is gone and that I can finally enjoy my manicures. All I can say is thank you Prolana
customer_reviews.author: fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Made my nails dry and weak and everyone broke. Used exactly how the directions said to and within 3 weeks my nails were worse. Started over after cutting all my nails with no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Product DOES NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. In fact, it actually made my nails worse. It peels off almost right away and therefore the nails chip. It isn’t returnable; so know that if you purchase it, you will be stuck with it. Mine is going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dimarc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product loved the results!
customer_reviews.text: My Nail tek has been using Prolana Nail Optimizer since the 90s. She recomended that I use it on my thin and brittle nails. I am shocked to see results after only two weeks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AHM

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Nail Restorer
customer_reviews.text: For a year my formerly strong nails had been chipping and splitting. I could not get them to come back to health, no matter what kind of treatment I used, or nutrition I tried. A nail technician gave me a sample of Nail Optimizer and suggested I use it every day on my nails. Amazingly, my nails have all been growing out with the help of this treatment, and out of 10 fingernails, I now have 8 really strong, growing nails. My two index fingernails are still a little challenged, but they are coming along. I feel like this nail treatment is somewhat of a miracle !
customer_reviews.author: DonnaC

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I got thos for my mom. Her nails were badly damaged from getting acrylic nails for years. Her nails began to grow back strong within a month!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Dries fast. Definitely can feel the difference in hardness right after application. But it seems thinner than a polish and starts to peel within a day or two near the tips and needs to be removed and reapplied. No matter how many coats you put on it does this.
customer_reviews.author: MK0298

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended if you have weak nails
customer_reviews.text: I have seen my nails grow very strong, I am in kitchen all the time. Cooking/cleaning, my hands are in the water a lot, before using this product I often use to see my nails getting brittle because of water and breaking. But after using this product, my nails are so strong, feels like I have acrylic. Absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal Utwani

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to have purchased this nail fortifier. It actually is doing its job. In the absence of the salon, this product helps strengthen my nails. One can use it as a stand alone or use it as a base coat, works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: After a lifetime of strong, nice-looking fingernails, they became brittle, started chipping and splitting, and developed ridges a couple of years ago. I tried this product based on reviews and by the end of the first week my nails were noticeably stronger. I've been using this for about a month and while ridges are still visible they don't seem as pronounced, and my nails are not chipping or splitting at all. I definitely recommend this magic elixir!
customer_reviews.author: herisrude

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am used to using Nailtiques Formula 2 to make My nails stronger... I thought I would switch it up and give this a try. Nothing close to Nailtiques. This is fine for a simple clear to shine your nails but peels off after a couple days and doesn’t help the nails much.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: FIxes nail problems
customer_reviews.text: I have one nail that continually splits when it reaches the end of my finger. I have been using this for a while now and while the end of my nail looks like it’s split...it’s not catching on any clothing. I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Work better than the others I tried
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because a different brand I had used for years has gotten too expensive. .This is the 3rd one I've tried and it works the best for me. It seems to keep my nails strong if I use it as directed and the price is better than the one I used previously.
customer_reviews.author: KC AZ

customer_reviews.title: Chips Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coz my nails are brittle and keep breaking. Well, this polish peels off after a few days making me have to do my nails over sooner then later. Obviously, I can’t return it now since I used it, bummer
customer_reviews.author: JessNYC

customer_reviews.title: Child’s play
customer_reviews.text: I was so very disappointed that after one day the polish was lifting and peeling. After a couple of days it was pretty much just cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated splitting
customer_reviews.text: I have vertical ridges in my fingernails (apparently from aging). The edges would split at the ridge. I used the Prolana Nail Optimizer for about 6 weeks and the problem was solved. (I stripped the old coat and applied a new one every five days.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s working.
customer_reviews.text: I had to peel off my powdered gel nails when quarantine closed salons. My nails were a mess. Shredding and chipping ! I thought I d try this. They’re slowly growing in better.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 72 years young and was never able to grow nails until my nail tech introduced me to Optimizer about five years ago. Nails were thin and would peel and break. Now they’re strong and beautiful. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products for Berchtesgaden YEARS and this is the only that has made my nails stronger and actually grow! I highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: No Chipping
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product multiple times. The top coat really does hold for 7 days, even with scrubbing the dishes.

customer_reviews.title: Best nail hardener!!
customer_reviews.text: Best nail hardener! My nails are so long and healthy. You really have to follow instructions to see results. Don’t give up you are going to love this product

customer_reviews.title: Clear top coat is a strengthener
customer_reviews.text: To thick to apply after three weeks of use. First three weeks were good for strengthening nails after removing SNS dipping powder.

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell
customer_reviews.text: There was no instructions in the box, only the small instructions on the back of the bottle which I had to use a magnifying glass to see. The smell was so bad that my husband who was sitting in the same room with me but at a distance, had a reaction by coughing. I also experienced the same reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great at strengthening my nails. I saw results within a couple of days. I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: queenbee1

customer_reviews.title: Peels/chips off
customer_reviews.text: Have no idea how this got so many good reviews. It doesn’t stay on, chips off very, very easily. I’ll go back to Nailtiques

This formula really works she has been using the product for three weeks and her nails are so strong and healthy. If you want results follow the instructions and you will see the difference after a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product. Effective for what is needed

customer_reviews.title: No more problem with my Nails!

customer_reviews.title: application method
customer_reviews.text: i got this product for my wife and just want to make sure about the way of application. so she has to apply one coat daily without removing it for 5 to 7 days then she use an acetone free polish nail to remove all the coats and then she repeats this process till she gets the desired result? .. thanks for your help.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Strengthen Nails and Lengthens Polish Wear
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I have my nails back to the length they were so many years ago after years of sculptured nails (IBD gel) and CND shellac. All you do is apply this as a base coat and top coat. Makes my polish last a week and this is very inexpensive!

customer_reviews.text: It claims to harden nails and prevent splitting and cracking. I had more splits and cracks after using it then I had before. It wears off rather quickly. I should have stuck to the Orly brand that I was buying before. It was less money and better on my nails.

customer_reviews.text: Using this to keep my self applied pedi longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Feigner

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've really had nails since, well, EVER. They are naturally very thin and weak, peeled all the time, never grew past my fingertips. After I started using Nail Optimizer every night (put it on and let it build up for 5 days, then remove and start over), they actually started growing and now look like happy, healthy nails, even though I only get manicures once every few months. I also like that it dries faster than regular nail polish. The only slight downside is that it can take a little longer to take off all the layers, but it's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my gel polish from chipping in the 2 weeks I go between polishes.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be ashamed of your nails anymore !
customer_reviews.text: I love this product !!!!! I never had nails. I had stubs no I had nubs !! I would try to grow my nails but they would get to a certain length and then crack in the corners and my nail would peel right across my finger. Not any more, I have beautiful nails because of Prolana. I enjoy wearing rings, nail polish, and not having to hide my hands because of terrible looking nails is the biggest plus. Prolana made my nails very strong, long and elegant. What more can you ask for !

I get compliments all the times about how wonderful my nails look thanks to this product. Actually when I placed this order, I was buying it for another friend who had the same problem.

product_meta.title: Prolana Nail Optimizer One-Step Multi Use Nail Fortifier, Nail Hardener, Nail Strengthener - Optium Strength Nail Treatment .5 ounces/ 15 milliliters
feature_bullets: Enriched Nail Hardener Formula That Contains Protein and Calcium to Grow Healthy Nails, Strong Nails, and Flexible Nails
Does NOT contain Toluene or DBP.
Repairs thin nails, cracked nails, and peeling nails with regular use. Nail Optimizer is recommended with regular manicure application as a base coat.
Provides a high shine finishing with instant dry time.
Contains Formaldehyde at a minimal dosage
